rows.text:
Main Protagonist
Revenge Queen (复仇女王)
He Guoping's wife
He Tianqing's mother
Guan Ying's elder sister
Mark's sister-in-law & enemy
Lawyer
Revenge Queen's secret leader
Zhang Xiaofeng, Zeng Jing, Wu Kai En and Ni Qiaowen's boss
Seeks revenge against Mark for her deceased sister
Starts to turn against her husband from Episode 11 onwards after Revenge Queen is framed by the police for murder of Zhuang Meifang
Finally faced off against her husband in Episode 18 after she was framed for murder of Mark and handcuffed him in Episode 18
Threatened by Hong Yan to "kill" the other Revenge Queen members by drinking poisoned wine and then stabbed them, but tricked Hong Yan in the end in Episode 20
Arrested by her husband while facing off with Hong Yan again and got jailed for 7 years along with the other Revenge Queen members in Episode 20
Gave birth to He Tianqing in the end

Main Protagonist
Taxi driver
Li Bingqiang's ex-wife & enemy
Zhou Shanhong's love interest
Revenge Queen's team member
Beaten up by Li Bingqiang 3 years ago
Gets her revenge against Li Bingqiang and saved Guan Xin in the process in Episode 8
Arrested in Episode 20 and got jailed for 7 years along with the other Revenge Queen members

Main Protagonist
Martial art expert
Massage therapist
Thirty-sixth descendant of the E Mei Troupe
Revenge Queen's team member
Zhao Xianghai's girlfriend, unknowingly he is a "Masked Man" & a member from Xin Yi gang
Met Xianghai in episode 12
Quits Revenge Queen after choosing love with Xianghai over friendship in Episode 15
Died in episode 16 after being kicked in the chest by Xianghai
(Deceased - Episode 16)

Main Protagonist
Guo Wenbin's ex-wife
Cindy's ex-rival in love
Formerly in love with Jason until she realises Jason's evil deeds
Almost killed herself in Episode 1
Attacked by Wenbin in Episode 3
Housewife; ex-accountant
Revenge Queen's team member
Arrested in Episode 20 and got jailed for 7 years along with the other Revenge Queen members

Main Protagonist
Revenge Queen's team member
Raped few years before by Liu Zhenyang
Arrested in Episode 20 and got jailed for 7 years along with the other Revenge Queen members
